summary.title: Security fix for Memorystore Redis
summary.summary: A security fix has been implemented for Memorystore Redis to address CVE-2025-49844.

2025-08-26.content: You can now use Cloud Logging to query and view maintenance logs for a Memorystore for Redis instance. For more information, see [View maintenance logs](https://cloud.google.com/memorystore/docs/redis/view-maintenance-logs). This feature is [Generally Available](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Cloud Logging for Memorystore for Redis Maintenance Logs
summary.summary: View maintenance logs for your Memorystore for Redis instances using Cloud Logging.
